email_body:
I came across Core Health and Performance while researching fitness and wellness businesses in Westport and wanted to reach out.

You have a perfect 5.0 Google rating — a strong signal of trust for anyone looking for a health and fitness provider in the area. The main gap I noticed is the absence of a blog or content section, which limits how often the site surfaces for relevant local searches beyond your existing audience.

I work with health and wellness businesses on local SEO improvements — specifically setting up a content section, adding structured schema markup, and embedding Google Reviews dynamically. This is a defined starter package, typically completed in two weeks, that creates an ongoing foundation for organic visibility.

If it would help, I am happy to send over a short walkthrough of what that would look like for a business like yours.

Best regards
